version_description: Fixed an issue with TTS instability on iOS 7 devices.
Fixed an issue with TTS instability on iOS 7 devices.
Restored Midori button for users with the Midori Japanese dictionary installed.
Restored Midori button for users with the Midori Japanese dictionary installed.

In accordance with our humane bug catch-and-release principles, we gently shepherded some bugs out of the app and into the wilderness of California's serene redwood forests, where they will live out the rest of their days harmlessly trying to crash the beauty of nature.

(... we killed them.)

Fixed an issue that prevented checking out the demo or logging in for the first time. Happy studying!
